name: Serper
description: Adapter for Serper (Google Search API). Provides search and website scraping capabilities.

operations.name: Search
operations.description: Performs a search query using Serper.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Search type (e.g., search, images, news, videos).

operations.name: Scrape Website
operations.description: Scrapes content from a given URL.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the website to scrape.

parameters.name: includeMarkdown
parameters.description: Whether to include Markdown formatted content in the response.
